captions.text: [applause]

So, last time we did one of
these shows our next guest was

the highlight, going toe-to-toe
with the great Katy Perry.

This year she's back with
another one of her

favorite performers, ladies
and gentlemen, Jodi DePiaza
and Weird Al Yankovic.
[cheers and applause]

♪ I met him in a swamp
down in Dagobah ♪

♪ Where it bubbles all the time
like a giant carbonated soda ♪
♪ S-O-D-A, soda

♪ I saw the little
runt sitting there on a log ♪

♪ I asked him his name and in a
raspy voice he said "Yoda" ♪
♪ Y-O-D-A, Yoda
♪ Yo-yo-yo-yo Yoda.

♪ Well, I've been around,
but I ain't never seen ♪

♪ A guy who looks like a muppet,
but he's wrinkled and green ♪

♪ Oh, my Yoda
Yo-yo-yo-yo Yoda ♪

♪ Well, I'm not dumb,
but I can't understand ♪

♪ How he can lift me in the air
just by raising his hand ♪
♪ Oh, my Yoda

♪ Yo-yo-yo-yo Yoda
Yo-yo-yo-yo Yoda. ♪

♪ Well, I left home
just a week before ♪

♪ And I've never ever
met a Jedi before ♪

♪ But Obi Wan, he set
me straight, of course ♪

♪ He said, "Go to Yoda and
he'll show you the Force" ♪

♪ Well I'm not the kind
that would argue with Ben ♪

♪ So it looks like I'm
gonna start all over again ♪

♪ With my Yoda
Yo-yo-yo-yo Yoda ♪

♪ Yo-yo-yo-yo Yoda
Yoda ♪

♪ Yo-yo-yo-yo Yoda
Yo-yo-yo-yo Yoda. ♪

♪ So I used the Force I picked
up a box I lifted some rocks ♪
♪ While I stood on my head

♪ Well, I won't forget
what Yoda said ♪

♪ He said, "Luke,
stay away from the darker side ♪

♪ And if you start to go astray,
let the Force be your guide" ♪

♪ Oh, my Yoda
Yo-yo-yo-yo Yoda ♪

♪ "I know Darth Vader's
really got you annoyed ♪

♪ But remember, if you kill him,
then you'll be unemployed" ♪

♪ Oh, my Yoda
Yo-yo-yo-yo Yoda ♪

♪ Well, I heard my friends
really got in a mess ♪

♪ So I'm gonna have to leave
Yoda I guess ♪

♪ But I know that I'll be
coming back some day ♪

♪ I'll be playing this
part 'till I'm old and gray ♪

♪ The long-term
contract I had to sign ♪

♪ Says I'll be making these
movies till the end of time ♪

♪ With my Yoda
Yo-yo-yo-yo Yoda ♪

♪ Yo-yo-yo-yo Yoda
Yoda ♪

♪ Yo-yo-yo-yo Yoda
Yo-yo-yo-yo Yoda Yoda ♪

♪ Yo-yo-yo-yo Yoda
Yo-yo-yo-yo Yoda Yoda ♪

♪ Yo-yo-yo-yo Yoda
Yo-yo-yo-yo Yoda Yoda ♪

♪ Yo-yo-yo-yo Yoda
Yo-yo-yo-yo Yoda Yoda ♪

♪ Yo-yo-yo-yo Yoda
Yo-yo-yo-yo Yoda Yoda ♪
[cheers and applause]

Jodi DePiaza, Weird Al
Yankovic, thank you, you guys.
That was awesome.
[cheers and applause]

title: Night of Too Many Stars - Jodi DiPiazza and "Weird Al" Yankovic Perform "Yoda"

comments.text: That asian kid going in hard af﻿
comments.author: Kappa Davidson

comments.text: This is why I love Weird Al﻿
comments.author: joe carson

comments.text:
I think her performance is so much more confident and professional than the 
Katy Perry one, and Weird Al totally connects with her while giving her the 
spotlight.﻿
comments.author: chickadee

comments.text:
My son is non-verbal autistic. TY gives me hope. Doesn't beat her 
performance w/
Katy Perry tho﻿
comments.author: gjruff77

comments.text:
She came to my school yesterday and preformed Firework and I almost cried 
it was so amazing XD﻿
comments.author: HaleySkies

comments.text:
I have a pro musician friend who posted this on his Facebook wall and said 
"when you crush it on a gig, you crush it on a gig. This is exactly how 
this song should go."  He's totally right! Jodi, you crushed it and with 
Weird Al!﻿
comments.author: Farah Chisham

comments.text:
hi jodi dipazza, its your friend Abbey. I just wanted to say that you are 
amazing at piano!!! Keep it up!﻿
comments.author: Abbey Kendrick

comments.text:
So talented. So adorable. So precious. So special. Puts a big NYC boy like 
me into tears.﻿
comments.author: The Sashman

comments.text:
I just love the way they kept looking at each other through the song.  Both 
my daughter and I have Aspergers, and we know how much you have to be 
feeling to actually show the joy she has when she looks at Al.  They shine.

Al, you are a truly amazing human being.﻿
comments.author: James Wiebe

comments.text: Is he a Jedi or Jesus?﻿
comments.author: KyleToTheMax

comments.text: for those who don't know, this is a parody of an old song, Lola﻿

comments.text: That has to be one of the best things I have seen in my entire life.﻿

comments.text: Can you imagine if they did the Yoda Chant?﻿
comments.author: PickyMcCritical

comments.text:
As a Geek who was a Star Wars fan as a kid AND a Weird Al fan even back 
when this song came out, this is great.  As a Geek-Adult, who is experience 
the prescience of this song with Mark Hamill still playing Luke now that he 
is old and gray, this is amazing.  As a Geek-Dad seeing the joy in these 
kid's faces and the pure exhilaration in every second that they shared the 
stage with Yankovic...this is AWESOME!!﻿
comments.author: Alex Rosenheim

comments.author: linglingjr

comments.text:
So good on so many levels.  But to name a few: She's playing the piano 
flawlessly and with great rhythm and rock feeling.   She's singing HARMONY 
at the same time.   She's singing all those words!  She's not playing 
second fiddle to Al, she's right in there with him like a pro!  I must have 
watched this 5 times and I'd be happy to watch it 5 more times tonight!﻿

Susan Boyle. And oh yes, Mr. Yankovic does a fine job, too.
